Verses: 1 dhaaveedhin Kumaaranum Erusalemin Raajaavumaagiya Prasangiyin Vaakkiyangal.
2 maayai, Maayai, Ellaam Maayai Endru Prasangi Sollugiraan.
3 sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Manushan Padugira Ellaap Prayaasaththinaalum Avanukku Palan Enna?
4 oru Sandhadhi Pogiradhu, Maru Sandhadhi Varugiradhu; Boomiyo Endraikkum Nilaiththirukkiradhu.
5 sooriyan Udhikkiradhu, Sooriyan Asthamikkiradhu; Thaan Udhiththa Idaththirku Adhu Thirumbavum Theevirikkiradhu.
6 kaatru Therke Poi, Vadakkeyunchutri, Suzhandru Suzhandru Adiththu, Thaan Sutrina Idaththukke Thirumbavum Varum.
7 ellaa Nadhigalum Samuththiraththile Odi Vizhundhum Samuththiram Nirambaadhu; Thaangal Urpaththiyaana Idaththirke Nadhigal Marupadiyum Thirumbum.
8 ellaam Varuththaththinaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Adhu Manusharaal Sollimudiyaadhu; Kaangiradhinaal Kan Thirupthiyaagiradhillai, Ketkiradhinaal Sevi Nirappappadugiradhumillai.
9 mun Irundhadhe Inimelum Irukkum; Mun Seyyappattadhe Pinnum Seyyappadum; Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Noodhanamaanadhu Ondrumillai.
10 idhaip Paar, Idhu Noodhanam Endru Sollappadaththakka Kaariyam Ondrundo? Adhu Namakku Munnulla Poorvakaalangalilum Irundhadhe.
11 mun Irundhavaigalaippatri Gnaabagam Illai; Appadiye Pinvarum Kaariyangalaippatriyum Inimeliruppavargalukku Gnaabagam Iraadhu.

13 vaanaththinkeezh Nadappadhaiyellaam Gnaanamaai Visaariththu Aaraaichchi Seygiradharku En Manadhaip Prayogampanninen, Manupuththirar Indhak Kadunthollaiyil Adipadumpadikku Dhevan Adhai Avargalukku Niyamiththirukkiraar.
14 sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Seyyappadugira Kaariyangalaiyellaam Gavaniththup Paarththen; Idho, Ellaam Maayaiyum, Manadhukku Sanjalamumaayirukkiradhu.

16 idho, Naan Periyavanaayirundhu, Enakkumun Erusalemilirundha Ellaaraippaarkkilum Gnaanamadaindhu Therinen; En Manam Migundha Gnaanaththaiyum Arivaiyum Kandarindhadhu Endru Naan En Ullaththile Sollikkonden.
17 gnaanaththai Arigiradharkum, Paiththiyaththaiyum Madhiyeenaththaiyum Arigiradharkum, Naan En Manadhaip Prayogampanninen; Idhuvum Manadhukku Sanjalamaayirukkiradhendru Kanden.
18 adhiga Gnaanaththile Adhiga Salippundu; Arivuperuththavan Novuperuththavan.
